General.Name: Champ Resto Indonesia PT
General.Description: PT Champ Resto Indonesia Tbk operates and manages a chain of restaurants in Indonesia. It operates Raa Cha, a self-service suki and barbecue (BBQ) restaurant; Gokana, a Japanese cuisine restaurant; BMK, an Indonesian cuisine restaurant; Platinum, a western and fusion cuisine; Chopstix, a Chinese Asian cuisine restaurant; and Monsieur Spoon, a French bakery, café, and bistro. The company also operates outlets in greater Jakarta, Java, Bali, Sumatra, and Sulawesi of Indonesia. In addition, it engages in the wholesale of coffee, tea, cocoa, bakery products, and food and beverages. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Champ Resto Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Barokah Melayu Foods Pte. Ltd.
General.Address: Jl. Raya Tanjung Barat No. 81A RT 002/04, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12530
